character.name: Destiny
description: An enchantress. Can spend <c=status>SHARD</c> to empower her cards, and uses a variety of different <c=keyword>shields</c> with different effects.

description.m&k: In combat, <c=keyword>right click or ctrl-click</c> this card to spend <c=status>SHARD</c> and unlock a new set of actions for the rest of combat.
description.controller: In combat, press {{Button}} on this card to spend <c=status>SHARD</c> and unlock a new set of actions for the rest of combat.

Explosive.name: explosive
Explosive.description: When this card is played, attack for {{Damage}} damage, then remove this trait for the rest of combat.

MagicFind.name: Magic Find
MagicFind.description: Gives 1 <c=status>SHARD</c> and <c=downside>decreases by 1</c> at the start of every turn.

PristineShield.name: Pristine Shield
PristineShield.description: This ship cannot take hull damage. <c=downside>Decreases by 1 at the start of every turn, and whenever it negates damage.</c>

Imbue.name: Imbue
Imbue.description: When unlocked, applies <c=cardtrait>{{Trait}}</c> to this card.

ChainReaction.name: CHAIN REACTION
ChainReaction.description: Whenever you play an <c=cardtrait>explosive</c> card, increase the damage dealt by <c=cardtrait>explosive</c> by 1 for the rest of combat.

Sanctuary.name: SANCTUARY
Sanctuary.description: If you end your turn without having moved, gain 1 <c=status>ENERGY NEXT TURN</c>.

ShardBank.name: SHARD BANK
ShardBank.description: If your <c=status>SHARD</c> is at its maximum, <c=status>MAGIC FIND</c> does not deplete.

ShieldProficiency.name: SHIELD PROFICIENCY
ShieldProficiency.description: <c=status>PRISTINE SHIELD</c> and <c=status>PERFECT SHIELD</c> prevent damage to your <c=status>SHIELD</c>.

WellRead.name: WELL-READ
WellRead.description: On your first turn, gain 3 <c=status>MAGIC FIND</c>.

Books.name: CRYSTAL BALL
Books.description: Whenever you lose any <c=status>SHARD</c>, trigger <c=status>MAGIC FIND</c>.

Cat.name: AI BOMB
Cat.description: Every 8 turns, all <c=card>Basic Shots</c> gain <c=cardtrait>explosive</c> until end of combat.

Isaac.name: TELEKINESIS
Isaac.description: Every turn, if you have any <c=status>MAGIC FIND</c>, gain 1 <c=status>DRONESHIFT</c>.

Louis.name: LAPIS LAZULI
Louis.description: When unlocking a new tier of an <c=cardtrait>enchanted</c> card, gain 1 <c=status>TEMP SHIELD</c> for each <c=cardtrait>gem</c> in hand.

Marielle.name: STEADY FLAME
Marielle.description: If you end your turn without moving, apply 1 <c=status>HEAT</c> to the enemy, then increase this amount by 1 until you next move.

Max.name: NECRONOMICON
Max.description: The first time you <c=cardtrait>exhaust</c> a non-<c=cardtrait>temp</c> card each turn, gain 1 <c=status>SHARD</c>.

Peri.name: EXPLOSIVE TEMPER
Peri.description: <c=cardtrait>Explosive</c> gains double the damage from <c=status>OVERDRIVE</c> and <c=status>POWERDRIVE</c>.

Riggs.name: BAG OF HOLDING
Riggs.description: Every turn, if you have any <c=status>MAGIC FIND</c>, draw an extra card.

Ty.name: FAMILIAR
Ty.description: Fully-enchanted cards can be enchanted again for 1 <c=status>SHARD</c> to <c=action>imbue</c> <c=cardtrait>wild</c> onto them.

DestinyExe.name: Destiny.EXE
DestinyExe.description: Get {{Shard}} <c=status>shard</c>. Add 1 of {{Count}} <c=cardtrait>discount, temp</c> <c=CB9077>Destiny</c> cards to your hand.

description.None: 2 random cards in your <c=keyword>deck</c> gain <c=cardtrait>explosive</c> for the rest of combat.
description.A: 3 random cards in your <c=keyword>deck</c> gain <c=cardtrait>explosive</c> for the rest of combat.
description.B: A random card in your <c=keyword>deck</c> gains <c=cardtrait>explosive</c> for the rest of combat.
